attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence to sack Jose Mourinho as Manchester United manager
attributes.additional_details:
His record and honours speak for themselves.
All my evidence is available on Wikipedia
attributes.background: His reputation is being tarnished and it is unfair the way he is being treated by the club, he is being forced out of his employment which for me is disgusting and disrespectful as well as being very discriminatory to a foreign uk citizen
